Author: quietlyinteresting
Text: BP a pizza that’s going to be hard on your body, your mind and your soul. Best thing you can do is talk it out.   Don’t be so hard on yourself. If you did eat 200 or 1000 kcals you would still crave a pizza. It’s the thoughts behind it not what the bodies feeling. It’s also a lot of other factors not hunger related.   You should be proud of yourself your working to control you BP. It won’t happen in a day, a week or even maybe a month but you will get to live how you want to live. Sometimes there will be set backs I know I have been there.   From someone who had a bad binge problem I understand. If I can help I will.  Keep talking keep posting.
